text:
Sarah Catharine Paulson (born December 17, 1974) is an American actress. She was born in Tampa, Florida.
Paulson played Maggie Corner in the "Family Values" episode of Law & Order. She played Anne Gillette in the episode "Shadow" of the same series. She played several characters in different seasons of "American Horror Story". She played Dr. Caron in the movie "Serenity". She also starred in "The Post".
